summary: This is a brief email chain from July 7, 2019, discussing that attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg will be appearing on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein the following day. The email is forwarded by an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, indicating coordination within the prosecution team.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: Identified as appearing on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in a legal proceeding the day after this email was sent.

persons.name: Marty Weinberg
persons.context: Identified as appearing alongside Reid Weingarten on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in a legal proceeding.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual whom Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg are representing in an upcoming legal proceeding.

connections.description: Weingarten is appearing as legal counsel on behalf of Epstein.
Weinberg is appearing as legal counsel on behalf of Epstein.
Both attorneys are appearing together on behalf of the same client, Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Legal Appearance for Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg are scheduled to appear on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in a legal proceeding.

keyFacts: On July 7, 2019, an email indicates defense attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg will be appearing for Jeffrey Epstein the next day.
The email is forwarded by an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York, showing prosecution awareness of defense counsel movements.
The correspondence suggests active legal proceedings involving Epstein were ongoing in early July 2019.
